pageTitle: AG Ex Boyfriend Cropped Jeans | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Leg opening: 14in / 35.5cm Inseam: 25in / 63.5cm Rise: 8in / 20cm MEASUREMENTS Made in the USA. Wash cold. 75% cotton/25% lyocell. Fabric: Lightweight denim. Heavily whiskered 5-pocket boyfriend jeans in an ankle length. The cuffs can be rolled for a cropped look. Button closure and zip fly. Description Jeans > Clothing > AG > video play
textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer AG jeans and apparel have become synonymous with great quality and state-of-the-art denim washes. Launched in 2000 by Yul Ku, a pioneer in the industry, AG started as a boutique denim line. Since Ku’s son’s takeover as Creative Director in 2008, AG has embraced a fresh, lifestyle-based path without losing its long-held signature style: chic, sophisticated, classic. See all AG reviews Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free.
